headline: Show HN: A tool to seed your dev database with real data
description:
A bunch of developers and myself have created RepliByte - an open-source tool to seed a development database from a production database.

Features:

  - Support data backup and restore for PostgreSQL, MySQL and MongoDB
  - Replace sensitive data with fake data
  - Works on large database (> 10GB) (read Design)
  - Database Subsetting: Scale down a production database to a more reasonable size
  - Start a local database with the prod data in a single command
  - On-the-fly data (de)compression (Zlib)
  - On-the-fly data de/encryption (AES-256)
  - Fully stateless (no server, no daemon) and lightweight binary
  - Use custom transformers
My motivation:

As a developer, creating a fake dataset for running tests is tedious. Plus, it does not reflect the real-world data and painful to keep updated. If you prefer to run your app tests with production data. Then RepliByte is for you as well.

Available for MacOSX, Linux and Windows.

https://github.com/Qovery/replibyte
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 用真实的数据为你的开发数据库播种的工具
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 用真實的數據為你的開發數據庫播種的工具
description_zh-Hans:
一群开发人员和我自己创建了RepliByte - 一个开源工具，用于从生产数据库中播种开发数据库。

功能：

 - 支持PostgreSQL、MySQL和MongoDB的数据备份和恢复
  - 用假数据替换敏感数据
  - 在大型数据库（> 10GB）上工作（阅读设计）。
  - 数据库子集。Scale down a production database to a more reasonable size
  - Start a local database with the prod data in a single command
  - On-the-fly data (de)compression (Zlib)
  - On-the-fly data de/encryption (AES-256)
  - Fully stateless (no server, no daemon) and lightweight binary
  - Use custom transformers
My motivation:

As a developer, creating a fake dataset for running tests is tedious. Plus, it does not reflect the real-world data and painful to keep updated. 如果你喜欢用生产数据来运行你的应用程序测试。那么RepliByte也适合你。

可用于MacOSX、Linux和Windows。

https://github.com/Qovery/replibyte
description_zh-Hant:
一群開發人員和我自己創建了RepliByte - 一個開源工具，用於從生產數據庫中播種開發數據庫。

功能：

 - 支持PostgreSQL、MySQL和MongoDB的數據備份和恢復
  - 用假數據替換敏感數據
  - 在大型數據庫（> 10GB）上工作（閱讀設計）。
  - 數據庫子集。Scale down a production database to a more reasonable size
  - Start a local database with the prod data in a single command
  - On-the-fly data (de)compression (Zlib)
  - On-the-fly data de/encryption (AES-256)
  - Fully stateless (no server, no daemon) and lightweight binary
  - Use custom transformers
My motivation:

As a developer, creating a fake dataset for running tests is tedious. Plus, it does not reflect the real-world data and painful to keep updated. 如果你喜歡用生產數據來運行你的應用程序測試。那麼RepliByte也適合你。

可用於MacOSX、Linux和Windows。

https://github.com/Qovery/replibyte
